name: UEditableTextBox
doc:
Allows the user to type in custom text.  Only permits a single line of text to be entered.

* No Children
* Text Entry

MinimumDesiredWidth: The minimum desired size for the text
IsCaretMovedWhenGainFocus: Workaround as we lose focus when the auto completion closes.
SelectAllTextWhenFocused: Whether to select all text when the user clicks to give focus on the widget
RevertTextOnEscape: Whether to allow the user to back out of changes when they press the escape key
ClearKeyboardFocusOnCommit: Whether to clear keyboard focus when pressing enter to commit changes
SelectAllTextOnCommit: Whether to select all text when pressing enter to commit changes
AllowContextMenu: Whether the context menu can be opened
KeyboardType: If we're on a platform that requires a virtual keyboard, what kind of keyboard should this widget use?
VirtualKeyboardOptions: Additional options to use for the virtual keyboard summoned by this widget
VirtualKeyboardTrigger: The type of event that will trigger the display of the virtual keyboard
VirtualKeyboardDismissAction: What action should be taken when the virtual keyboard is dismissed?
ShapedTextOptions: Controls how the text within this widget should be shaped.
OnTextChanged: Called whenever the text is changed programmatically or interactively by the user
OnTextCommitted: Called whenever the text is committed.  This happens when the user presses enter or the text box loses focus.
OverflowPolicy: Sets what happens to text that is clipped and doesn't fit within the clip rect for this widget
HintText: Hint text that appears when there is no text in the text box
IsReadOnly: Sets the Text Box as Readonly to prevent it from being modified interactively by the user
IsPassword: Sets whether this text box is for storing a password
Justification: How the text should be aligned with the margin.

methods.name: GetText
methods.doc:
Gets the widget text
@return The widget text

methods.name: SetHintText
methods.doc:
Sets the Hint text that appears when there is no text in the text box
@param InHintText The text that appears when there is no text in the text box

methods.name: SetIsReadOnly
methods.doc: Sets the Text as Readonly to prevent it from being modified interactively by the user

methods.name: SetText
SetTextOverflowPolicy
methods.doc:
Set the text overflow policy for this text box.

@param InOverflowPolicy the new text overflow policy.
